resources.string: Learn more about the importance of hydration
Adjust Water Intake Based on Activity
Avoid Drinking Too Much Water at Once
The app that simplifies life for taxi drivers AnyTaxy allows you to track your real-time location on an interactive map powered by Google Maps. Move with ease and precision!
Keep track of your journeys with detailed information: distance traveled, duration, and the route taken. Stay organized and transparent with your work.
With automatic updates every 5 seconds and an offline mode, AnyTaxy works flawlessly, even without an internet connection.
